meanings.definition: A person or company that provides a service.
meanings.sent1: The servicers arrived promptly to fix the broken dishwasher.
meanings.sent2: Many servicers in the city offer cleaning and maintenance services.
meanings.sent3: The servicers at the party were the ones serving delicious snacks.
meanings.sent4: The servicers of knowledge are the librarians who help you find books.
meanings.sent5: The friendly servicers greeted customers with a smile at the store.

meanings.definition: The act of serving or providing a service.
meanings.sent1: Her servicers at the restaurant were quick and attentive.
meanings.sent2: Quality servicers ensure customer satisfaction and loyalty.
meanings.sent3: The servicers of cake at the party were in high demand.
meanings.sent4: The servicers of justice must be fair and impartial.
meanings.sent5: The servicers of the community work tirelessly to help those in need.
